what?.....oh.then she came out and shot at BH.....i don't know what your
promblem is, there's nothing in the rules saying i can't do that....okay,
here's the replacement mail....the Radicons lie there, but Arrow's hand came
up and grabbed BH by the neck and started to strangle him!.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <crow_lord@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 28, 2000 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

>
